entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regex ranges with unicode chars #64519
  • Self contained application does not start when the current directory is the application directory and current directory containing {appname}.runtimeconfig.json but does not contain {appname}.deps.json #64517
  • Intermittent issues while executing "CoCreateInstance" to native c++ target #64516
  • Signing certificate with ECDsa works in Windows, invalid signature in Linux #64515
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #64514
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonEncodedText equivalent to XmlWriter #64513
  • Override MemoryStream.ToString #64512
  • [API Proposal]: Add to ServiceCollectionDescriptorExtensions generic .Replace<T> method #64510
  • Memory leaks when reverse P/Invoke is called from unmanged thread #64509
    7.0.0
  • SerialPort on Linux fails to open for 250k baud #64507
  • Regression introduced in the https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/51772 #64505
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/eh/basics/trythrowcatchfinally_d/trythrowcatchfinally_d.sh #64504

Closed

  • TextElements result changed in .NET6.0 #64489
    7.0.0
  • ArrayList.ToArray(type) throws exception for enum type in Blazor WebAssembly #64387
    6.0.x
  • SIGTSTP and SIGCONT handlers do not maintain default behavior #64511
  • C++/CLI .NET Core 3.1 Injection to Native Process #33590
    Future
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63725
    Future
  • C#9 Function pointer with generic return parameter crashes with BadImageFormat #46402
    Future
  • Reconcile blittable and unmanaged concepts #59824
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.NothingRevoked #734
    7.0.0
  • separate target.h into platform dependent headers #11044
    Future
  • Http2's SendPingAsync may leak UnobservedTaskExceptions #64450
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'ppInfo->HasKeptAliveThis()' #64477
    7.0.0
  • R2R-CrossGen2 failure - loader/classloader/reffields/validate/validate.sh #64466
    7.0.0
  • R2R-CrossGen2 failure - loader\\classloader\\reffields\\validate\\validate.cmd #64465
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\RefFields\\Validate\\Validate.cmd #64484

PullRequests

Created

  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent rid agnostic tfm to libs #64518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use Reference items instead of P2Ps for inbox libs #64508
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Jit] Delete Statement::m_compilerAdded . #64506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests only in runtime-staging, as they are a bit #64503
    arch-wasm

Merged

  • [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64469
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Permit longer chain building fetching for dynamic revocation tests #64496
    area-System.Security, test enhancement, community-contribution
  • Fix UnobservedTaskException on Http2's SendPingAsync #64494
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fold inbox crypto into one assembly #64307
    area-System.Security
  • Fix layout and GCInfo for ByRef fields. #64422
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add support for `TYP_BYREF` `LCL_FLD`s to VN #64501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in project properties #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Introduce `GenTreeDebugOperKind` #64498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Surface message for missing EMSDK #1839
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Failure to compile HelloWorld #1838

Closed

  • Missing main.js and index.html for WebAssembly in sample or instruction. #1835

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update location of Emscripten #1836
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Improve docs #1837

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable IL scanner for LLVM to enable precomputed vtable slots #1834

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Explore having a regex codefix that offers to simplify regex when possible. #59165
  • Support quick info for embedded languages #59164
  • Add IDE support for StringSyntaxAttribute #59163
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle nullable annotations on user defined operators and conversions #59169
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Roslyn.Hosting.Diagnostics.csproj #59167
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move FunctionIdOptions to EditorFeatures #59166
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59162
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59161
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59160
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • AddImportPlacementOptions #59028
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on options from IDiagnosticService #59096
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2 #59147
    Area-IDE
  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Receiving error when invoking IDistributedCache.SetAsync: Wrong number of args calling Redis command From Lua script #39879
  • FromServices in MVC package instead of DependencyInjection? #39881
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted App startup Project issue #39878
  • [Blazor wasm, auth] 404 Static files downloading from /authentication #39876
  • [Question] `HttpContext.TraceIdentifier` vs `Activity.Current.Id` #39873

Closed

  • Improve Blazor localization handling #38675
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39867
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #39871
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39872
  • Try contributing to aspnetcore with Codespaces #34436
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Only call IsSelfSigned() once #39877
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Refactor : Small refactorings #39875
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) to PolicyHttpMessageHandler #39874
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve App build reliability and performance #39870
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix typo in 'knownMehods' #39880
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) on ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #39865
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • chore (codespaces) : Use latest omnisharp build #39861
    community-contribution, area-razor.compiler
  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc
  • Consistently serialize child members returned from route handlers #39858
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label control's text attribute does not handle non-english alphabet characters, and it throws XamlCTask error #4412
  • MAUI Projects do not show platform specific .cs C# code files except for the first TFM in the TargetFrameworks list #4410
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Ensure XAML / C# Hot Reload, Live Visual Tree code is removed from release builds #4409
  • [Enhancement] Add appsettings support #4408
    .NET 7
  • NavigationPage.HasBackButton property not working in Windows 11 #4407
  • Cannot change Android SDK version from 31 to a lower one. #4404

Closed

  • App crashes in Release configuration #4358
    6.0.200-preview.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the ignored .cs files to None #4411
    6.0.200-preview.13

Merged

  • Remove legacy TFMs #4403
  • [WinUI] Fix Alignment and Header Visibility #4400
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Correctly register DependencyService entries #4385
    area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4395
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [X] add error diagnostics to XamlG sourceGen #4376
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls [iOS] #3141
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    area/setup 🪄
